analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x6994cdede012f06fb43e6084907834ccb35144a1.sol:
	Contract BookToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x6994cdede012f06fb43e6084907834ccb35144a1.sol#216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x6994cdede012f06fb43e6084907834ccb35144a1.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
